description.type: Type of notice: success, warning, danger, info.
description.message: An array with two parameters: title and text
description.icon: The icon name as a string.
description.stretch: If true, the notice will stretch to the full width of the viewport.
description.dismissable: If not false, the notice will have a close button. Allowed trueish values: imidiate (show notice on reload), session (show notice at next visit, default), permanent (show notice when local storage is wiped).
description.action: An array with two parameters: label and url.
